topic.title: Embed the Java Applet in Your SharePoint Site

body.p: To embed the Java Applet in your SharePoint site, edit the page that contains the applet and add a new Script Editor Web Part next to an existing Documents web part.It is recommended that you deselect the Enable Java content in the browser option from the Java Control Panel until you finish editing the page. Otherwise, the browser will load the applet for every change that you will make.
